Seasonal ARIMA models can potentially have a large number of parameters and
combinations of terms. Therefore, it is appropriate to try out a wide range of models
when ﬁtting to data and choose a best ﬁtting model using an appropriate criterion ...
— Pages 143-144, Introductory Time Series with R , 2009.
Alternately, a grid search can be used across the trend and seasonal hyperparameters.
